Package com.mtvi.plateng.maven.hudson

Interface Summary
AbstractHudsonMojo.JobClosure Callback interface for the forEachJob method.
 

Class Summary
AbstractActionPerJobMojo Abstract base class for mojos that need to do something for all jobs or just one job.
AbstractHudsonMojo Base class for working with Hudson.
AddJobMojo Goal which creates a Hudson job.
AddTwitterMojo Goal which adds Twitter notifications to a job or all jobs.
AdjustViolationsMojo Mojo that changes the settings of the Violations Hudson plugin.
BuildAllMojo Goal which hits a Hudson server and builds all of the jobs.
ReplaceJobMojo Goal which replaces a Hudson job's configuration
 

Enum Summary
AbstractHudsonMojo.PluginType Enum that defines the update types we can add plugins configurations for.
